wxWebUpdateListCtrl Class Reference

The wxListCtrl which lists the REMOTE packages available as they are parsed from the remote XML WebUpdate script. More...

#include <webupdatectrl.h>

 Rebuilds the list of the packages inside the main wxListCtrl using the #m_arrUpdatedPackages array.

 Updates the local version fields of all items in the listctrl using the version strings stored in the local package array.
wxWebUpdateCheckFlag IsPackageUp2date (const wxString &name)
 Returns a wxWebUpdateCheckFlag for the given package (both the remote & local package arrays are used, obviously!).
wxWebUpdateCheckFlag IsPackageUp2date (const wxWebUpdatePackage &p)
wxWebUpdatePackage * GetNextPackageToDownload ()
 Returns the first remote package which is checked and which has not been marked as already downloaded.
wxWebUpdatePackage * GetNextPackageToInstall ()
 Returns the first remote package which is checked, which has been marked as downloaded, has not been marked as installed yet and whose requirements are all met.
bool IsReadyForInstallation (int n)
 Returns TRUE if the n-th item of the remote package array (not the n-th item of the listctrl!) is ready to be installed.
void Lock ()
 Makes impossible for the user to modify the check status of the current packages.
void Unlock ()
 Restore the user ability to check/uncheck items.

wxWebUpdateLocalPackageArray m_arrLocalPackages
 The local packages currently installed.
wxWebUpdatePackageArray m_arrRemotePackages
 The packages we have downloaded from the web.
wxArrayBool m_bDownloaded
 An array of flags; TRUE for the n-th entry means that the n-th package (referring to the m_pUpdatesList listctrl package array) has already been downloaded and is ready for installation.
wxArrayBool m_bInstalled
 An array of flags; TRUE for the n-th entry means that the n-th package (referring to the m_pUpdatesList listctrl package array) has already been installed.
bool m_bLocked
 TRUE if this listctrl is currently "locked". See Lock() for more info.

Detailed Description

The wxListCtrl which lists the REMOTE packages available as they are parsed from the remote XML WebUpdate script.

Member Function Documentation

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::AdjustColumnSizes (   ) 
 

Adjust the width of the columns of the listctrl.

Not to call from a OnSize() event handler since it would then interfere with user resizing events altering the size set by the user.

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::CacheDownloadSizes (   )  [protected]
 

Launches our thread for caching the sizes of the packages shown in this listctrl.

You need to call RebuildPackageList after this function.

bool wxWebUpdateListCtrl::CanBeChecked (  int  n  ) 
 

Returns TRUE if the n-th item can be checked (by the user).

wxWebUpdatePackage * wxWebUpdateListCtrl::GetNextPackageToInstall (   ) 
 

Returns the first remote package which is checked, which has been marked as downloaded, has not been marked as installed yet and whose requirements are all met.

int wxWebUpdateListCtrl::GetPackageIndexForItem (  int  i  )  const [protected]
 

Returns the index in our m_arrRemotePackages array for the n-th item currently shown in this listctrl.

The two indexes could not match when, for example, we are showing only outdated packages in the listctrl.

wxWebUpdatePackage & wxWebUpdateListCtrl::GetRemotePackage (  const wxString &  name  ) 
 

Returns the remote package with the given name or wxEmptyWebUpdatePackage if such package could not be found.

wxWebUpdatePackageArray& wxWebUpdateListCtrl::GetRemotePackages (   )  [inline]
 

Returns the array of updated packages parsed from the WebUpdate XML Script.

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::RebuildPackageList (  wxWebUpdateListCtrlFilter   ) 
 

Rebuilds the list of the packages inside the main wxListCtrl using the #m_arrUpdatedPackages array.

Removes any old content.

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::SetLocalPackages (  const wxWebUpdateLocalPackageArray &  arr  )  [inline]
 

Sets the array of local packages.

wxWebUpdateCheckFlag wxWebUpdateListCtrl::SetLocalVersionFor (  int  idx,
wxWebUpdatePackage &  curr
)  [protected]
 

Sets the local version field for the listctrl item at idx #idx using the idx-th item of the local package array for retrieving the version string.

Uses the given remote package for checking its update state.

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::SetRemotePackages (  const wxWebUpdatePackageArray &  arr  ) 
 

Sets the array of remote packages.

You need to call RebuildPackageList after this function.

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::Unlock (   )  [inline]
 

Restore the user ability to check/uncheck items.

void wxWebUpdateListCtrl::UpdatePackagesVersions (  wxWebUpdateListCtrlFilter   ) 
 

Updates the local version fields of all items in the listctrl using the version strings stored in the local package array.

The packages we have downloaded from the web.

wxArrayBool wxWebUpdateListCtrl::m_bDownloaded [protected]
 

An array of flags; TRUE for the n-th entry means that the n-th package (referring to the m_pUpdatesList listctrl package array) has already been downloaded and is ready for installation.

wxArrayBool wxWebUpdateListCtrl::m_bInstalled [protected]
 

An array of flags; TRUE for the n-th entry means that the n-th package (referring to the m_pUpdatesList listctrl package array) has already been installed.

bool wxWebUpdateListCtrl::m_bLocked [protected]
 

TRUE if this listctrl is currently "locked". See Lock() for more info.
